Summary: +Observed triangular shaped UFO moving slowly overhead while loading truck at 5:55AM
divs: Sighting DetailsI was loading our pick up truck at 5:55 AM and noticed a lit,triangular object passing slowly almost directly overhead. It made no noise or emissions. I pointed it out out to another motel customer and we watched it together for another few minutes.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Susanville
There were no other sightings in Susanville on or around April 3rd 2013
